text: Sentivue AI: Lumina UX and Insight Guide. Sales Strategy: The Art of the Insight. 1. The Sentivue Philosophy: Minimalist Intelligence. Lumina is the 'Executive Brain' that summarizes the noise of the cloud. 2. Dashboard UX: 'Zero-Click' Reporting. Generative AI creates dynamic dashboards. Table 1: Lumina Component Architecture.

sections.heading: 1. The Sentivue Philosophy: Minimalist Intelligence
sections.content: Focuses on providing insights rather than raw data, acting as an executive brain for business decisions.

sections.heading: 2. Dashboard UX: 'Zero-Click' Reporting
sections.content: Leverages Generative AI to deliver personalized dashboards for different roles (e.g., Marketing vs. Finance).

tables.title: Table 1: Lumina Component Architecture
rows: Condenses multi-page reports into 3 bullet points
Forecasts metrics 6 months into the future
Allows conversational charting (e.g., 'Why are sales down?')
Auto-generating charts highlighting key data points

text: 3. Predictive Analytics: The 'Future-Sight' Engine. Lumina tells you what will happen tomorrow. Table 2: Prediction Accuracy by Sector. 4. Positioning Sentivue vs. Infrastructure. 5. Implementation Strategy: The CXO Pitch.

sections.heading: 3. Predictive Analytics: The 'Future-Sight' Engine
sections.content: Lumina moves beyond historical data to provide future forecasts across retail, SaaS, and finance.

sections.heading: 4. Positioning Sentivue vs. Infrastructure
sections.content: Differentiates from infrastructure companies (like Kyberon) by focusing on the 'Message' and business strategy rather than the 'Machine'.

sections.heading: 5. Implementation Strategy: The CXO Pitch
sections.content: Positions Lumina as a digital advisor that ensures the user is always three steps ahead of the competition.
